GitHub Actions Workflows Changelog

2025-05-24

Improved

  • Enhanced workflow YAML formatting with document start markers (---) across all files
  • Extended branch configuration updates to additional workflows including angular-client-lint.yml, codeql-analysis.yml, and jfrog.yml
  • Added concurrency controls to all workflow files to prevent redundant runs
  • Standardized file formatting by updating indentation and removing trailing spaces
  • Improved documentation comments across all workflow files
  • Updated AILESSONS.html with additional workflow standardization guidance

2025-05-23

Fixed

  • Improved setup-nodejs GitHub Action to better handle working directory paths based on job context
  • Fixed incorrect directory reference in ci.yml (changed 'client' to 'client-angular')
  • Removed invalid input parameters from setup-nodejs action calls
  • Enhanced directory handling in setup-nodejs action for all job types (client, server, and root)
  • Added improved error reporting with directory context information
  • Implemented environment variable to share working directory between steps in the setup-nodejs action

2025-05-03

Changed

  • Updated workflow triggers to run on all branches using branches: ['**'] pattern to catch issues earlier in development
  • Added concurrency controls to prevent multiple instances of the same workflow from running simultaneously
  • Fixed invalid branch configuration in frogbot.yml that used incorrect syntax
  • Updated incomplete branch configuration in monitoring.yml to run on all branches
  • Updated the CI/CD section in documentation to reflect branch-specific steps pattern
  • Added example of conditional execution for branch-specific actions in documentation

2025-05-02

Fixed

  • Fixed node-path output in base-config.yml workflow by adding an explicit step to capture the Node.js path
  • Added a new step Get Node.js path that uses which node to get the Node.js executable path and set it as an output
  • Updated the output reference from steps.node-setup.outputs.node-path to steps.get-node-path.outputs.node-path

2025-05-01

Fixed

  • Fixed Node.js caching issue in CI/CD workflows that was causing the error: "Some specified paths were not resolved, unable to cache dependencies"
  • Removed npm caching configuration from all Node.js setup steps in both angular-tests.yml and server-tests.yml workflow files
  • Changed npm ci commands to npm install since there are no package-lock.json files in the repository
  • Added comments explaining why caching was disabled to improve maintainability
  • Added if-no-files-found: warn to artifact upload steps to prevent failures when test coverage files don't exist yet
  • Ensured all file copy commands use || true to handle cases where source files don't exist yet
  • Fixed artifact upload paths to include both original source directories and copied files in the downloaded-reports directory
  • Removed duplicate workflow files that were accidentally created during the fix process

2025-04-XX

Added

  • Created new consolidated security-reporting.yml workflow that combines functionality from security-alerts-report.yml and sync-snyk-issues.yml
  • Created new docs-generation-and-deployment.yml workflow that combines documentation generation and GitHub Pages deployment
  • Added this CHANGELOG.html file to track workflow changes

Changed

  • Updated sync-workflow-errors.yml to run daily instead of every 6 hours to reduce redundancy
  • Standardized Node.js version to 22.x across all workflows
  • Updated GitHub Actions to use the latest versions (v4 for checkout, setup-node, etc.)
  • Modified all workflows to save generated files to the downloaded-reports/ directory structure
  • Updated generate_docs.js script to support an --output-dir parameter

Deprecated

  • Marked security-alerts-report.yml for removal (replaced by security-reporting.yml)
  • Marked sync-snyk-issues.yml for removal (replaced by security-reporting.yml)
  • Marked generate-docs.yml for removal (replaced by docs-generation-and-deployment.yml)
  • Marked github-pages.yml for removal (replaced by docs-generation-and-deployment.yml)
